divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the moon with my telaskope then there was a star beside it so i tryed to get it on in view im not very good at getting these things at the mo but any way in the skope the star was moving very fast then i looked out of the windo (i was in my bed room at the time ) and it wasint the star that was moving it was still in the same place it was the first time what i thought was a star was a orb it was very low in the sky the same hight as a chopper it was very clear to see there was no flashing lights on it just a bright ball of light it was moving NW to SE then it went in to a cloud i know what i saw it was to low to be a star and not high to be a plane and there was no sound and no contrals it was a ufo i was happy to see it and happy that it happend to me i just wish i had my cam or was able to wprk that dam teleskope to get a better look
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Antrim
There were no other sightings in Antrim on or around January 8th 2010
